programme.desc: Zsa Zsa Gabor plays a neighbor from the golden age of movies, whom Will and Carlton suspect of stealing the family's silverware. Firth: John Petlock. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Riberio. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Bell Biv DeVoe shoots a video at the Bankses, courtesy of Carlton, who rents the house while his parents are away. Tyriq: Perry Moore. Director: David Bowe. Veronica: Shawn Murray. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: After winning at the country club's Monte Carlo night fund-raiser, Will learns that he's expected to donate the money to charity. Firth: John Petlock. Ramon: Brandon Adams. Cummings: Don Amendolia. Brett: Richard Penn. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: On a family ski trip, the Banks find that they must come up with Christmas gifts from the heart after their belongings are stolen. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Fred: Don Sparks. Janice: Charlayne Woodard. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Betty White guest stars as the maid Jay hires to replace her while she's away in Florida. Jay might have it tough when she returns, because the woman's an excellent cook and seamstress. She's also uncommonly adept at auto mechanics and TV repair. She can even beat Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey) at chess. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael doesn't think that modeling's a wise career choice for Claire, but when an agent (Carole Davis) tells him he has the perfect equipment to be a hand model, he thinks it's fine for him. Meanwhile, Kady's spending time with a girl named Rachel (Liliana Mumy), making Franklin very jealous. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It's “game night” at the Kyle house, but it isn't exactly fun and games when the couples play “What Do You Know?” “What You Don't Know” would be more like it. “There's this weird energy here,” moans Michael. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. Tony: Andrew McFarlane. Franklin: Noah Gray-Cabey. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) is more than a little bit pregnant. In fact, she's a week overdue. She wants a natural childbirth at home, presided over by a new-agey midwife named Summer Breeze (Kelly Coffield). Fat chance of that happening. Meanwhile, Claire suspects Kady of pilfering her perfume and lipstick. (repeat)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan is devastated when an injury prevents him from tatting his childhood idols; Charmaine tries to persuade Cobra to stay at 9Mag; Jenn's inadvertent nip slip sends Van over the edge; and there's a photo shoot for a major tattoo magazine. (repeat)

programme.title: Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party
programme.desc: Tichina Arnold and Ross Matthews join Snoop and Martha for a spooky meal of shrimp brains, eye eggs and a scrumptious cadaver, but things get really scary when Snoop and Martha go head-to-head in an epic wrap battle. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: In the Season 6 premiere, the Harris family returns as an even bigger brood as Tip and Tameka's baby girl, Heiress Diana, is introduced. However, the biggest news is the separation of Tip and Tameka. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. and Tiny put on a brave face for their family and throw Heiress a fun-filled christening. Later, the time has come for a decision to be made about their marriage. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Conclusion. The reunion continues with Masika and Hazel facing off. Later, Willie and Kyesha's texts are revealed; Rosa accuses Safaree of being cheap; and Moniece makes a shocking allegation that one of the guys has a child with a mistress. (repeat)

programme.title: Scared Famous
programme.desc: In the series premiere, ten celebrities move into one of the creepiest estates in America and endure scares, gruesome challenges and one-on-one eliminations for a shot at winning $100,000 for their favorite charity. (repeat)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan is devastated when an injury prevents him from tatting his childhood idols; Charmaine tries to persuade Cobra to stay at 9Mag; Jenn's inadvertent nip slip sends Van over the edge; and there's a photo shoot for a major tattoo magazine. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: A look at the rocky romance between two young friends, the son of an NBA player and the tomboyish girl next door, who grow up together over the span of 15 years and become basketball stars

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop New York: Dirty Little Secrets
programme.desc: A look into the original city in the "Love & Hip Hop" franchise. Highlights include never-before-seen, exclusive footage from the first seven seasons with bloopers and interviews. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: This reality series follows the lives of five women involved in the hip-hop industry, either through the men in their lives or their own career ambitions. In the opener, rapper Somayo Reece goes to New York and meets rapper Jim Jones, who agrees to collaborate with her. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Olivia boasts about dating a sexy New York Jet, and Emily calls her out on it. Meanwhile, Somaya's manager sets up a risqué photo shoot to solve her cash-flow problem, but Somaya can't do it; and Chrissy and Jim's mother fight over planning his birthday party. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Chrissy sees Somaya perform, and tells Jim she's not ready to record, which leads to a blow-up between Somaya and Chrissy. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Chrissy stirs up trouble by telling Jim Jones about a conversation that Somaya and her manager Maurice had about him, and Maurice learns a hard lesson about disrespect. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Olivia tries to find her own voice working in the studio, and leave her G-Unit style behind. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Rich arranges a listening party for Olivia, and she must do well to be taken seriously. Meanwhile, Chrissy decides to propose to Jim. How will Jim's mother react? (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Chrissy proposes and Jim says, "I'm with you," but Momma Jones is furious, forcing Chrissy to confront her. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Jim has cold feet about planning a future with Chrissy, Emily reconsiders her relationship after hearing a rumor, and Rich confronts Somaya about the way she treated Olivia. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Wendy Williams Show
programme.desc: (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Real
programme.desc: Wendy Raquel Robinson ("The Mayor"); the hosts discuss negative comments on social media pages; and a game to win shoes. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Season 2 opens with Chrissy still lacking a ring on her finger. Meanwhile, Emily decides to finalize a romance. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Battle lines are drawn in the wake of a clash at Emily's bash. Meanwhile, Chrissy receives a self-help book, courtesy of Yandy. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Singer Teairra Mari helps nudge Emily back into the single life by taking her to an industry bash for a magazine-cover photo. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Olivia's troubles with her mother come to the fore. The mommy issues continue when Jim's mother tries to mend relations with Chrissy. Meanwhile, Kimbella attempts to make peace with Emily by throwing a party for her. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Single working mother Emily scores a plum styling job during New York Fashion Week. However, her single status is soon questioned when she receives a visitor. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Jim revs up and purchases a brand-new shiny car—a move that exasperates Chrissy, who's still waiting for a brand-new shiny ring. Chrissy gains a newfound sense of purpose when she reaches out to a trustworthy aunt and uncle. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Chrissy heads to Miami with Emily and Olivia to forget about her issues with Jim. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Chrissy is the recipient of a tender proposal in Miami. Elsewhere, producer Rico Love woos both singer Teairra Mari and Olivia, stirring up instant friction. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Olivia meets with Funkmaster Flex as her record-deal aspirations may soon come to fruition. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Impreska

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny".
